questions.q: How do I use this app?
questions.a: In order to properly use this app, simply search for your courses and tap on the search results to add them. After that, simply select the timeslots that you wish to have on your schedule. After selecting the options for all of your classes, you will be brought to a calendar page to finalize your options before you are able to export it to Google Calendar.

questions.q: How does this application know when to stop recurring events on my calendar?
questions.a: Using UC San Diego's academic calendar, the application is able to determine when the last week of instruction is for each quarter. As a result, the application will automatically set the end recurrence date to be week ten of a quarter.

questions.q: How does the custom events feature work?
questions.a: Custom events in this application is defined as an event that is related to the course you are scheduling in the application. Example custom events would be office hours for course instructors, weekly review sections that were not apparent in WebReg. This function does NOT serve to schedule personal events such as work hours or doctor's appointments.
